    public static final class CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder
extends Object
    Builds CrawlerConfiguration instances.

      • setCrawlStrategy

        public CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder setCrawlStrategy(CrawlStrategy strategy)
        Sets the crawl strategy to be used by the crawler. Breadth-first strategy orders crawl requests by the lowest crawl depth, whereas depth-first orders them by the highest crawl depth.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the crawl strategy
        Returns:
        the CrawlerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setDuplicateRequestFiltering

        public CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder setDuplicateRequestFiltering(boolean filterDuplicateRequests)
        Enables or disables duplicate request filtering.
        Parameters:
        filterDuplicateRequests - true means enabled, false means disabled
        Returns:
        the CrawlerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setOffsiteRequestFiltering

        public CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder setOffsiteRequestFiltering(boolean filterOffsiteRequests)
        Enables or disables offsite request filtering.
        Parameters:
        filterOffsiteRequests - true means enabled, false means disabled
        Returns:
        the CrawlerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setMaximumCrawlDepth

        public CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder setMaximumCrawlDepth(int maxCrawlDepth)
        Sets the maximum crawl depth. It should be a non-negative number (0 means no limit).
        Parameters:
        maxCrawlDepth - the maximum crawl depth
        Returns:
        the CrawlerConfigurationBuilder instance

      • setCrawlDelayStrategy

        public CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder setCrawlDelayStrategy(CrawlDelayStrategy strategy)
        Sets the crawl delay strategy to be used by the crawler. This strategy defines how the delay between each request is determined.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the crawl delay strategy
        Returns:
        the CrawlerConfigurationBuilder instance

        public CrawlerConfiguration.CrawlerConfigurationBuilder setFixedCrawlDelayDuration(Duration fixedCrawlDelayDuration)

        Returns:
        the CrawlerConfigurationBuilder instance
